name: Starcaster
tooltip:
Starcaster

Cost: 2700
+25 Ability Haste
+70 Ability Power
+300 Health
+200% Mana per 5

UNIQUE Passive - Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion with the most missing health for 60 - 90 (based on target's level) (2 second cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this heal by 25%, stacking up to 4 times for maximum of 100%.

UNIQUE Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
